description: This file defines the IUserRepository interface, which abstracts user data operations such as retrieval by id, email, username, adding, updating, friendship checks, and saving changes within the FrndAppBackend project.

classes.name: IUserRepository
classes.description: Interface for user data management operations, including retrieval, modification, friendship checks, and database persistence.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a user by their unique identifier (GUID).

methods.name: GetByEmailAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a user by their email address.

methods.name: GetByUserNameAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a user by their username.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a new user to the data context.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously updates an existing user's data.

methods.name: IsFriendAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously checks if two users are friends based on their user IDs.

methods.name: GetFriendsAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves the list of accepted friends for a specified user.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Persists all pending changes to the database asynchronously.
